snippet: The legislation would have allowed the denial of business services to same-sex couples because of religious beliefs.
abstract: Kansas bill that would have allowed individuals to refuse to provide business services to same-sex couples because of religious beliefs meets surprising and quick end when conservative senators side with liberal advocates in saying measure promoted discrimination.
lead_paragraph: The legislation would have allowed the denial of business services to same-sex couples because of religious beliefs.

headline.main: In Kansas, Right Joins Left to Halt Bill on Gays
headline.print_headline: In Kansas, Right Joins Left to Halt Bill on Gays

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
